properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cape Mendocino to Pt. Arena CA from 10 to 60 nm; Coastal waters from Cape Mendocino to Pt. Arena CA out 10 nm
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 14 at 2:53AM PST until January 16 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, west winds 20 to 30 kt with
gusts up to 40 kt and seas 9 to 14 feet at 12 seconds. For the
Gale Watch, south winds 25 to 35 kt with gusts up to 50 kt and
seas 10 to 15 feet at 9 seconds possible.

* WHERE...Cape Mendocino to Pt Arena out 10 nm and Cape
Mendocino to Pt Arena 10 to 60 nm.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 3 PM PST Wednesday.
For the Gale Watch, from Wednesday afternoon through late
Wednesday night.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT
